extendedInfo.description: A stupid app that gets people to stop asking to see you android. Just shows a broken screen with some fun touch effects. Tell them "no you can't check out my new phone as its broken - see...." UPDATE: sound REMOVED-- also if you like this free please buy the paid version -- its the same, but some beer money would be nice...

reviews.comment: At a distance or for a glance, its pretty convincing. Great for free, but a longer pic would be nice for large screen phones. Droid Incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: i sat my phone on the counter @ work with this app running and told 1 person it was fake but everyone else felt bad for me \"dropping\" it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would definitely use this app if it were long enough to cover my entire screen. (Droid) but it is a very creative concept ^_^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: wish dat u could do sum crazy code or sumthing 4when u wanna escape. Instead of jus clickin a button. That goes straight to home. like blue screen lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow George. Asking for attention much? Ur parents didnt beat you over an app that u can easily exit out of. CPS needs to be called on your family.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: its alright.if you want to waste time one day and press on this app and try to trick someone,be my guest.uninstalled,it doesnt look real on my droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does just what it says. Tricked a couple people. No real use. However you could con your parents out of replacement money haha. Just a thought
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun app but to easy to get out of........should update to have to press the menu button 3 times before it close

reviews.comment: Do nor get! Its a total waste of time. All it does is bring up one of the crappyiest non-croped photo you will ever see.

reviews.comment: My boyfriend thought i really broke my phone. The look on his face was classic. Lol

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t cover the entire screen. Looks like when a desktop screen gets cracked and not a smart phone. Samsung Captivate
